content.value: Ok @AscentTheGame is amazing. I initially dismissed it, because the first 10 minutes are kind of slow. I thought it would be dull. It’s absolutely amazing, it’s twin-stick Cyberpunk Diablo without the grindy boring parts. The graphics are absolutely extraordinary. Recommended.
